The Data Science Event You Need in 2019

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Analytics, CA, Data Science, Marketing, Marketing Analytics, San Francisco

MADS Can Help You Achieve Your 2019 Goals! Marketing Analytics and Data Science is coming to San Francisco, Apr 8-10. KDnuggets readers save 20% with VIP Code MADS19KDN. Register Today and Save!


Sponsored Post.

April 8-10, 2019
Hyatt Centric Fisherman's Wharf
San Francisco, CA
Exclusive Offer for KDNuggets Readers:  Save 20% with VIP Code MADS19KDN
Register Today and Save!
MADS Can Help You Achieve Your 2019 Goals 
 
2019 is finally upon us. Have you set your 2019 training goals? Let Marketing Analytics and Data Science be the event to help you drive your business forward.

Join the conversation as innovative companies like Google, Cisco, Uber, and Nike share how they are effectively using data. Our expertly crafted agenda helps you stay on top of industry trends while you learn from others in the field.
 
Download the Full Brochure
 
Hear from keynote speakers like:
Hilary Mason 
GM of Machine Learning, Cloudera and Former Chief Data Scientist
Bitly
Avinash Kaushik
Digital Marketing Evangelist and Author of
Web Analytics 2.0 and Web Analytics: An Hour A Day
Join us to experience collaborative round tables, interactive workshops, real-world case studies and visionary keynote sessions to help you deliver faster and actionable data. Early Bird Savings expire on January 11, 2019.
Save 20% with VIP Code: MADS19KN
Register Now
